thread.section_title: Entertainment and Leisure Businesses For Sale in Canada
thread.title: Greenhouse With Home

title: Greenhouse With Home
text: Questions Business Summary 166 x 1,296 lot (5.0 acres). This desirable 5.0 acre property is located on No 5 Road and Blundell. Lots of future potential. Great family run business and work at home. Greenhouse operation has 24 greenhouses, 12 heated, all poly. The house on for lot has 5 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms, 24 greenhouses. Long time solid wholesale clientele selling COOP as well. Live in the house or use as extra rental revenue. Both retail and wholesale operation. Great detached building for the retail operation. Long and well established business open for 40 plus years on a main street. Financials Gross Revenues: Seller Will Provide Cash Flow: Seller Will Provide Cash Flow Type: EBITDA
